alert.note: Alert for Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 10:12PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Ouachita County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1011 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McNeil, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camden... Stephens... Chidester... Poison Springs State Park... Cullendale... East Camden... Warner... Harmony Grove... Bragg City... Buena Vista... Fairview in Ouachita County... Troy... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southwestern Arkansas.
